column1: Ha­rry, pr[1]n­do ha­cer «¡chss!» sin de­jar de pa­re­cer hos­p[2], in­di­có a Do­bby un lu­gar en la cama, y el elfo se sen­tó hi­pan­do.
column2:
Harry, trying to go "chssss!" while still looking hospitable, indicated a place on the bed to Dobby, and the elf sat down, hiccuping.
---
1 - pro­cu­rando
2 - hospi­ta­la­rio
He finally managed to restrain himself

column1: ex­pli­có el elfo, que se ha­bía que­da­do un poco biz­co
column2: explained the elf, who had gone a little cross-eyed.
